title: Selenian
summaries: The Selenian is a Hardmode, post-Lunatic Cultist enemy that spawns in the area of the Solar Pillar during the Lunar Events. It is a ground-based enemy that wields two flaming swords and possesses a spinning attack that causes it to quickly lunge forward while reflecting the player's projectiles. It takes triple the damage from other player-inflicted sources while spinning. Selenians can reflect bullets, arrows, and darts, but not rockets, and the projectiles of numerous other weapons. For the complete list, see the list of reflected projectiles.

statistics.Damage: 90/180/270
statistics.Max Life: 800/1600/2400
statistics.KB Resist: 60%/64%/68%
statistics.Banner: [img:Selenian Banner]Selenian Banner(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions)
